member.summary: Definition of the interface describing all elements required to make you class available for Windows Forms Designer - Out Of Process fully compliant.

member.name: T:OopDesigner.Registry.UiKitRegistrator
member.summary: Definition of the class that is used to parse all assemblies in the current app domain to find a class implementing the specific IUiKitRegistration assembly to be embedded within this designer. Caution : we use Unity to perform this registration.
member.remarks: The assemblies beginning by System are ignored.

member.param: Reference to the container where to register
